CustomField.description: Estimated total processing time for workers in minutes. Calculated as (Completed At - Started At) minus Query Duration.
CustomField.formula: IF( AND(NOT(ISBLANK(Completed_At__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Started_At__c))), ((Completed_At__c - Started_At__c) * 24 * 60) - (IF(ISBLANK(Query_Duration_Ms__c), 0, Query_Duration_Ms__c) / 60000), NULL )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Rough estimate of worker processing time in minutes. Includes enqueue time, execution, and other overhead. Calculated as total job duration minus query duration.
CustomField.label: Worker Processing Time (min)
